mapper.select: select count(*) from vacation where vacation_mem_number = #{mem_number} and to_char(vacation_start, 'YYYYMMDD') like #{year}||'%' and VACATION_VP_NUMBER = 'vp1'

select mem_number,mem_name,mem_id,dept_name,position_name,mdi_carear as mem_carear,vp_totalday from member ,MEMBER_DETAIL_INFORMATION,VACATION_POLICY,department,position where mem_number= mdi_mem_number and dept_number = mem_dept_number and mem_position_number = position_number and mem_retirement = '1' and vp_number='vp1' and mem_number=#{mem_number}

select vp_number, vp_kind, vp_totalday , vp_payonoff , vacation_number , to_char(vacation_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as vacation_start, to_char(vacation_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as vacation_end, to_char(vacation_end_duedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as vacation_end_duedate, vacation_mem_number , vacation_vp_number , vacation_end-vacation_start as vacation_during from vacation,VACATION_POLICY where VACATION_VP_NUMBER = VP_NUMBER and VACATION_MEM_NUMBER = #{mem_number} and to_char(vacation_start, 'YYYYMMDD') like #{year}||'%'
